```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: web-app
spec:
  securityContext:
    runAsUser: 1000   ![1](assets/1.png)
    runAsGroup: 2000  ![2](assets/2.png)
  containers:
  - name: app
    image: k8spatterns/random-generator:1.0
```

```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: web-app
spec:
  containers:
  - name: app
    image: docker.io/centos/httpd
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        drop: [ 'ALL' ]            ![1](assets/1.png)
        add: ['NET_BIND_SERVICE']  ![2](assets/2.png)
```

```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Namespace
metadata:
  name: baseline-namespace
  labels:
    pod-security.kubernetes.io/enforce: baseline             ![1](assets/1.png)
    pod-security.kubernetes.io/enforce-version: v1.25        ![2](assets/2.png)
    pod-security.kubernetes.io/warn: restricted              ![3](assets/3.png)
    pod-security.kubernetes.io/warn-version: v1.25
```
